item.title: Translating Tidyverse to Python
item.description: I started this jupyter notebook to help me learn to (1) use both Python and R in one Jupyter notebook and (2) translate tidyverse syntax into Python (specifically pandas & seaborn) syntax. I figured I would post it in the hopes it might be helpful to someone else. Also, I wanted to learn how to post a jupyter notebook on this website. Helpful links: Rmagic Seaborn Tidyverse -> Pandas (Most of this is actually taken straight from this post) R + Jupyter This link helped me set up my environment so that I could use R and Python in one notebook.
